SEARCH
Package com.ccprog3.myfarm

Class Action

java.lang.Object
com.ccprog3.myfarm.Action
public class Action extends Object
The Action class. This class handles the game data manipulation. This is where the farming process, rock destroying, etc. happen.
Author:
John Joseph F. Giron

    Action.GameMode
    A GameMode enum to either run in Terminal or with GUIControl.

  • Constructor Details

    • Action

      public Action(Game currentGame)
      An Action constructor. Requires a Game object.
      Parameters:
      currentGame - The main Game object.

  • Method Details

    • playTerminal

      public void playTerminal(Scanner input)
      Sets the program to Terminal mode. Creates a Terminal object and destroys the terminal object
      Parameters:
      input - The main's single Scanner object. It must be reusable.

    • playGUI

      public void playGUI()
      Sets the program to GUIControl mode. Creates a GUIControl object and destroys the terminal object.

    • buySeed

      public void buySeed(int seedIdx, int quantity)
      Buys a seed. It also accounts the changes due to player's farmer title
      Parameters:
      seedIdx - The integer index of the seed.
      quantity - The number of seeds to buy.

    • pickaxe

      public void pickaxe(Ground ground)
      Destroys the rock on the given ground. Costs 50 in-game currency.
      Parameters:
      ground - The ground where the rock is.

    • plow

      public void plow(Ground ground)
      Turns the ground to plowed status. This will make the ground ready to plant a seed in.
      Parameters:
      ground - The ground to be plowed.

    • plant

      public void plant(Ground ground, String seedType)
      Plants a seed in the ground.
      Parameters:
      ground - The ground to plant the seed.
      seedType - The type of seed
      Root Crop
      Flower
      Fruit Tree

    • harvest

      public void harvest(Ground ground)
      Harvests the crop in the ground argument. This also determines the profit of the harvest.
      Parameters:
      ground - The ground of the crop

    • shovel

      public void shovel(Ground ground)
      Turns the ground to unplowed. Also reduces the money by 7 for any action outside removing withered crops.
      Parameters:
      ground - The ground to shovel on.

    • waterPlant

      public void waterPlant(Ground ground, int repeat)
      Waters the plant. This affects the profit from harvesting the plant.
      Parameters:
      ground - The ground in which the crop is planted on
      repeat - Number of times to water the plant

    • fertilizePlant

      public boolean fertilizePlant(Ground ground, int repeat)
      Gives the crop a fertilizer. This affects the profit from harvesting the crop.
      Parameters:
      ground - The ground in which the crop is planted to be given a fertilizer.
      repeat - The number of fertilizer to give the crop.

    • register

      public void register()
      Promotes the player. Note that there is no condition checking; it directly does the registration. The condition checking takes place in the Terminal and GUIControl class.

    • legibleToRegister

      public boolean legibleToRegister()
      Checks if the player is ready to register or promote to the next farmer type. It checks for the level requirement and the cost to register/promote. This will be appeared in the Terminal and GUIControl class
      Returns:
      Returns true if the player is ready to register/promote.

    • getMode

      public Action.GameMode getMode()
      Returns the mode of the game.
      Returns:
      A GameMode enum in which the game is running.

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      A getter function to refer to the running game.
      Returns:
      The main game.
